name: Squish N' Smash
description:
Squish & Smash is a top down 3D adventure game about The Girl and her escapade in the plasticine world.

Keyboard Controls:

W - up

A - left

S - right 

D - down

O - attack

P - pickup  

Spacebar - jump

Team Members:

Cedar - lead programmer & project manager

Henny - model & animations

Ivan - lead level design 

Ryan - audio & effects

References:

ToyTrain
https://free3d.com/3d-model/train-v1--285308.html

Toy Duck
https://free3d.com/3d-model/rubber-duck-v1--250409.html

Ruler
https://free3d.com/3d-model/-ruler-v1--316924.html

All sound effects are from https://freesound.org and their respected owners.

Game Music & Menu music provided by Anton  N.

Slug model provided by Maia H.
